title: There Is No Shade
description:
Karl Ravech and Buster discuss the Dodgers and Padres playing on Sunday Night Baseball, the Mets taking two of three games from the Dodgers, Brandon Nimmo’s home run robbery, if Karl would take Michael Harris II or Spencer Strider for NL rookie of the year, Gunnar Henderson impressing for the Orioles after his call-up and Shohei Ohtani putting a dent in Aaron Judge’s AL MVP chances. Then, Jessica Mendoza talks about the Dodgers’ bullpen, Edwin Díaz putting the past behind him, if she’s buying the Cardinals and how she would advise the incoming owner of the Angels on what to do with Ohtani.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
